text: saarvajanik udghoshana hai allaah aur usake rasool kee or se, bade haj ke din logon ke lie, ki "allaah musharikon ke prati jimmedaar se baree hai aur usaka rasool bhee. ab yadi tum tauba kar lo, to yah tumhaare hee lie achchha hai, kintu yadi tum muh modate ho, to jaan lo ki tum allaah ke qaaboo se baahar nahin ja sakate." aur inakaar karanevaalon ke lie ek dukhad yaatana kee shubh-soochana de do
